Docs.summary: Entry point to virtual machine scale set management API.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Deallocate (string groupName, string name);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Deallocate(string groupName, string name) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of the resource group the virtual machine scale set is in.
The name of the virtual machine scale set.
Docs.summary: Shuts down the virtual machine in the scale set and releases the compute resources.
